alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Benton; Marshall; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 2:27PM CDT until July 21 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Marshall County in northwestern Mississippi... Central Tippah County in northeastern Mississippi... Benton County in northeastern Mississippi... Western Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 227 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lamar, or 10 miles northeast of Holly Springs, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Holly Springs, Ripley, Lamar, Snow Lake Shores, Canaan, Theo, Slayden, Walnut, Ashland, Falkner, Chalybeate, Murry, Brody, Higdon, Collinstown, New Canaan, Whitten Town, Hamilton, Tiplersville and Hudsonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
